purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 18th ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Software Language Engineering (SLE 2025) scheduled for June 12-13, 2025, in Koblenz, Germany.
evidence_sentences: 18th ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Software Language Engineering (SLE 2025)
The ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Software Language Engineering (SLE) is devoted to the principles of software languages: their design, their implementation, and their evolution.

Like its predecessors, the 18th edition of the SLE conference, SLE 2025, will bring together researchers from different areas united by their common interest in the creation, capture, and tooling of software languages.
